benchmark_details.name: LaMP-QA (Long-form Personalized Question Answering)
benchmark_details.overview: The LaMP-QA benchmark is designed for evaluating personalized question answering in three diverse domains: Art & Entertainment, Lifestyle & Personal Development, and Society & Culture. It captures user-specific preferences and expectations for a more accurate and satisfying response.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve the performance of personalized question answering systems by providing a dataset that includes user context and expectations.

data.annotation: Expert annotations based on user queries and personalized rubrics.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the extent to which generated responses match user expectations as specified in user context.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment between generated responses and user-specific needs.
methodology.validation: Evaluated through comparative analysis against established baselines.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: User profiles are anonymized to respect user privacy during data collection and analysis.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Explicit consent obtained from users for data usage in research.
